alert.note: Alert for Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Watauga County through 730 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sugar Mountain, or near Newland, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boone... Blowing Rock... Foscoe... Blowing Rock In Caldwell County... Seven Devils... Valle Crucis... and Moses Cone Memorial Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for northwestern North Carolina...and southwestern Virginia.
